name: Trash, Smash, Dash!
description:
You are a Phish, you are very displeased from all the trash those darn land apes have tossed down here.

Because all your friends, family, and neighbours are all lazy, it's now up to you to save the seas!

Use Space to swim up. You need to collect the trash to clean the sea, and avoid the sea mines and spikey corral, or else you will explode!

Every 3 trash you clean, a land ape sends another sea mine into the sea. But despite that, you can fight back by charging up your meter by collecting trash, then DESTROY those pesky sea mines.

Every time you clean a peice of trash, there is a 1/20 chance a trash clump will spawn, being worth 5 times a regular peice of trash.

Watch out for sharks too, they will eat you, unless you don't feel like getting eaten.

Made for the #SEAJAM, Donate to TEAMSEAS here https://teamseas.org
